name: Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (FNF) is a leading provider of title insurance, technology, and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries. Founded in 1847, FNF has a rich history and has grown to become one of the largest title insurance companies in the United States. The company operates through multiple subsidiaries, offering a wide range of services including title insurance, escrow services, and property information services. FNF's commitment to innovation is evident in its investment in technology solutions that enhance the customer experience and streamline the closing process. With a focus on reliability and customer satisfaction, FNF serves a diverse clientele, including real estate agents, lenders, and developers. The company's robust financial position and strategic acquisitions have allowed it to expand its reach and enhance its product offerings. FNF is also dedicated to corporate social responsibility, supporting various community initiatives and philanthropic efforts. As a publicly traded company, FNF is committed to delivering value to its shareholders while maintaining high ethical standards in all its business practices.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. | Title Insurance and Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. is a leading provider of title insurance and real estate services. Explore our innovative solutions and commitment to customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does Fidelity National Financial provide?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial provides title insurance, escrow services, and technology solutions for the real estate industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: Mike Nolan is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity National Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: When was Fidelity National Financial founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial was founded in 1847.
